relation.text: 1789 -- I am in perfect charity with You , my dear Mrs- Dickinson , & am very much obliged
gave You about my Father , but Alaſs , We are just as we were two Months ago
continues during the Day , entirely on his Couch above Stairs . I am afraid of the effects of the Winter
s ode on the Grave of Arthur , I am now
go on rapidly . We have had your Acquaintance Mr- Collier here this Summer
a few days , who always gives
